creator: garg.chiku@gmail.com
text:
I am trying to simulate the network by changing the below two entries in jmeter.properties file but can not see any impact on the test.


Either i have tried or cps value to 10 or to 10240000 have no impact on the test.

Also what is the default network bandwidth used by the jmeter when these parameters are commented.

httpclient.socket.http.cps
httpclient.socket.https.cps

Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please subscribe to the JMeter user list and ask there.
creator: sebb@apache.org
